pvardefs.name: pcAction
pvardefs.desc: exclude from (I)nserts, (U)pdates, (W)here or combinations of it (e.g. 'UI')

pvardefs.name: pcExclude
pvardefs.desc: comma separated list of child tables to ignore, eg. where there is a 1:1 relationship and the child will be deleted with the adult
